title: Slim Extreme 3d Intensely Slimming + Firming Serum Anti-cellulite,8.8 fl. oz. (250 ml)
description: The innovative Serum Slim Extreme 3D, developed in the Eveline laboratory, uses an advanced formula to smooth and tone the skin, reducing the appearance of cellulite. Advanced formula delicately cools the skin. ACTIVE INGREDIENTS: IsocellSlim, Centella Asiatica, caffeine, menthol and ivy extract deeply moisturizes and soothes the skin.  The serum's caring formula, with minerals from the thermal waters of North Brittany and Laminaria algae extract, deeply moisturizes and perfectly refreshes the skin. The pleasant cooling sensation, which accompanies application, is a guarantee of the serum's instant effect. Active ingredients act in synergy, assuring a fast and effective treatment. APPLICATION: Every morning and evening, after using the Peeling gel Slim Extreme 3D Eveline Cosmetics, pat the Serum into areas affected by cellulite and excessive fatty tissue (thighs, abdomen, buttocks, arms). After application of the Serum, massage in the Cream Slim Extreme 3D.

title: Home Health Goji Berry Eye Cream, 1 Ounce
description: Home Health was founded 65 years ago with one goal in mind: "to research and develop the finest naturally-based bath and body care products available." today, their vision and philosophy remains the same, as they continue to deliver the natural health and healing products their customers demand and deserve. Home Health offers a full range of health and beauty products from skin care treatments and women herbal creams, hair care products and fragrant body splashes. All Home Health products are cruelty-free and developed without animal testing.

title: L'Oreal Paris True Match Super-Blendable Compact Makeup, Sand Beige, 0.30 Ounces
description: Introducing the first compact makeup to precisely match your skin’s tone and texture. the revolutionary formula feels like a liquid, but travels like a compact for an unbeatable compact makeup experience.
